name: Endurance
description: Represents the overall health, stamina, and resilience of the character. Endurance contributes to the character's maximum hit points, resistance to fatigue, and ability to endure physical strain.

name: Agility
description: Represents the nimbleness, dexterity, and overall coordination of the character. Agility affects the character's movement speed, dodging ability, and ranged attack accuracy.

name: Reflexes
description: Represents the speed of reaction, agility, and quick thinking of the character. Reflexes affect the character's ability to react swiftly to sudden events, dodge incoming attacks, and perform actions requiring quick thinking.

name: Strength
description: Represents the physical power and muscle of the character. Strength directly influences the melee damage bonus and carrying capacity of the character.

name: Willpower
description: Represents the mental strength, determination, and force of character of the character. Willpower affects the character's resistance to mental influence, ability to resist fear and intimidation, and strength of mind.

name: Logic
description: Represents the reasoning ability, problem-solving skills, and analytical thinking of the character. Logic influences the character's ability to analyze situations, solve puzzles, and understand complex systems.

name: Perception
description: Represents the awareness, sensory acuity, and observational skills of the character. Perception influences the character's ability to notice details, detect hidden objects or creatures, and perceive changes in their environment.

name: Charisma
description: Represents the charm, persuasiveness, and social influence of the character. Charisma influences the character's ability to interact with others, negotiate deals, and lead or inspire followers.

name: Attack
description: A Matrix attribute representing offensive computational power

name: Sleaze
description: A Matrix attribute representing stealth and subterfuge.

name: Firewall
description: A Matrix attribute representing strength integrated Matrix defense systems.
